title: Mango Ceviche with Zambos Plantain Ceviche
ingredients: 1 Seasoned with salt and pepper to taste
1 family-size bag of Zambos Plantain Ceviche
instructions: Step 1. In a bowl, mix all ingredients. Set aside and refrigerate for at least 8 hours.
Step 2. Then serve with Zambos Plantain Ceviche.
